parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)
parameters.label: ‚òÅÔ∏è Subscription

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.label: üóÇÔ∏è Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
//| where subscriptionId == '{Subscription:id}'
| project id

parameters.name: Help
parameters.label: üìñ Help
parameters.description: This will show some help information to help you understand the page you are on

content.json:
## Zoom Reports Workbook
### Change Log
Use this report to analyze the Zoom Reports logs ingested.
This Workbook also require a parser to be deployed.

|Version|Description|
|---|---|
|v1.0|Initial Workbook Created|

## Usage
	- Please select your **Subscription** and **Workspace**
	- Time Range: is the time you wish to query back to. i.e 7days from now, into the past.

content.query:
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Activity Over Time

content.query:
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize count() by Department
content.title: Across Department

content.query:
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize count() by LastClientVersion
content.title: Last Client Version

content.query:
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize count() by EventType
content.title: Event Types

content.query:
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize count() by EventName
content.title: Event Names

items.name: query - 4 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.query:
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize count() by Email
content.title: Users

items.name: query - 4 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.query:
let trend_data = (Zoom 
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Department);
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize ["Count"] = count() by Department
| join kind =inner
(
trend_data
) on $left.Department == $right.Department
| project-away TimeGenerated,Department1
content.title: Trend Across Department

content.query:
let trend_data = (Zoom 
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by LastClientVersion);
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize ["Count"] = count() by LastClientVersion
| join kind =inner
(
trend_data
) on $left.LastClientVersion == $right.LastClientVersion
| project-away TimeGenerated,LastClientVersion1
content.title: LastClientVersion Trend

| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize ["Count"] = count() by EventType
| join kind =inner
(
trend_data
) on $left.EventType == $right.EventType
| project-away TimeGenerated,EventType1

content.query:
let trend_data = (Zoom 
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Email);
Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| summarize ["Count"] = count() by Email
| join kind =inner
(
trend_data
) on $left.Email == $right.Email
| project-away TimeGenerated,Email1
content.title: Users Activity Trend

content.query:
let ZoomWithOs = (Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| extend OSType= case(LastClientVersion contains "mac","Mac",
LastClientVersion contains "win", "Windows",
LastClientVersion contains "linux","Linux",
"Unknown"));
let trend_data = (ZoomWithOs | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by OSType);
ZoomWithOs
| summarize ["Count"] = count() by OSType
| join kind =inner
(
trend_data
) on $left.OSType == $right.OSType
| project-away TimeGenerated,OSType1
content.title: OS Type Trend

content.query:
let ZoomWithOs = (Zoom
| where "{Users:label}" == "All" or Email in ({Users})
| extend OSType= case(LastClientVersion contains "mac","Mac",
LastClientVersion contains "win", "Windows",
LastClientVersion contains "linux","Linux",
"Unknown"));
let trend_data = (ZoomWithOs | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Email, EventType, OSType);
ZoomWithOs
| summarize arg_max(LastLoginTime,*), ["Activity Count"] = count() by Email, EventType, OSType
|join kind=inner
(
trend_data
) on $left.Email== $right.Email, $left.EventType== $right.EventType,$left.OSType== $right.OSType
| project Email,EventType,OSType,["Activity Count"], TimeGenerated, Trend
content.title: Latest Activities & Trend for Users
